title: ZuwaUSA Heavy Duty Drill Powered Pump 1? 16 GPM - Marine Grade Aluminum | Unistar-2001B (Drill not included)
features: FLOW RATE: 16 GPM max at 3000 RPM
CONNECTION: 1” NPT | Dry self priming to 13 Ft. | Max temperature 200°F | Working pressure of 58 PSI | The 3/8” shank fits all common chucks for most drills.
FLUID VISCOSITY: 1 (water) to 20,000 cP (heavy gear oil) | Transports a wide range of liquids, including liquids containing solids, oils and corrosives
DRILL POWERED: ZUWAUSA heavy-duty drill powered pump is designed to work with rechargeable/electrical drills with a maximum speed of 3,000 RPM
EMERGENCY WATER PUMP that can be used daily or stored in your bug out pack or bag
BEST DRILL PUMP on the market
description: ABOUT ZUWA USA ZUWA impeller pumps make efficient pump power available everywhere. Our drill pumps are designed for reliable, professional level use by using the highest quality materials in the enclosures and impellers. Additionally, ZUWA drill pumps are backed by JHProcess, located right outside of Philadelphia, with years of industry professional experience and outstanding customer service in the field of impeller pumps. OUR DRILL DRIVEN IMPELLER PUMPS Our pump series 2001-B is ideally driven with an Electric or Battery powered drill. The shaft can easily be fixed to the chuck of each regular electric or cordless drill and screwdriver. Connect the shaft of the pump with the chuck. The depth stop of the drill fully stabilizes the system and ready you are. Contrary to similar pumps on the market this pump is truly self-priming. It has a MACHINED METAL BODY instead of a cheap cast metal or plastic and a shaft with a top quality ball bearing which GUARANTEES A LONG LIFETIME.
